update T_ACCOUNT
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SALT = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
